Entries.68260005/f Mike 2500/o Mike/t 2000 2600: nightTime/16 20/farmer 14 24 0 Mike 16 20 2/skippable/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -2 0/move farmer 2 0 0/pause 500/speak Mike "嗨. @, 想和我一起去个地方吗?$u"/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Mike "一定会很棒的. 相信我.$h#$b#我一直想和你一起做这件事.$l"/emote Mike 32/pause 1000/move Mike 0 1 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer -100 -100/changeToTemporaryMap SebastianRide/ambientLight 0 0 0/specificTemporarySprite sebastianRide/pause 5000/viewport 15 8 true/speak Mike "你不知道我会开车, 对吗? 这是我的一个秘密爱好.$h#$b#我和塞巴斯蒂安的关系不太好, 但我们有时一起去兜风.#$b#我已经告诉他, 我剪完计划是去飙车了.#$b#难道你不喜欢兜风吗?$l"/pause 3000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeToTemporaryMap SebastianMountain/ambientLight 0 0 0/warp farmer 15 18/warp Mike 16 18/positionOffset farmer 0 16/playMusic spaceMusic/viewport 15 14 clamp true/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Mike 0/pause 500/faceDirection Mike 3/speak Mike "是不是很美? 每当我感到不知所措的时候, 我就会来这里."/faceDirection Mike 0/pause 1000/speak Mike "你知道吗, @... 我第一次遇见你的那段时间, 我其实很迷茫.#$b#我总是努力工作, 却不知道自己应该前往那里...#$b#但后来你出现了.$u#$b#你让我想道了一个未来... 嗯, 有你的未来.$l"/pause 500/faceDirection Mike 3/speak Mike "@, 我想知道..."/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Mike "你愿意你的未来能有我的存在吗?"/pause 3000/emote farmer 40/faceDirection Mike 0/speak Mike "你不必现在就给我答复. 好好想一想吧, 好吗?#$b#嗯, @. 谢谢你陪我来. 我很高兴我们今晚能如此谈心.$l"/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 2000/faceDirection Mike 3/pause 3000/emote Mike 60/speak Mike "@, 你今晚真漂亮.$l"/pause 2000/speak Mike "@. 请看着我.$s"/pause 1500/faceDirection farmer 1/emote Mike 20/speak Mike "先别动.$l"/pause 2000/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Mike -2 0/pause 100/showFrame 101/emote Mike 16/pause 500/emote farmer 20/pause 3000/viewport move 1 -1 8000/pause 6000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Saloon/pause 4000/end position 14 23
